content:
I've removed the part of #6344 involving Nat division. What's left is short and should be uncontroversial (and quick to review).

As per the discussion in the PR I'm still not fully convinced there's a good way to avoid natural division here, but I think that case is better made in a separate PR.
It would be cool to see some code demonstrating the use case where you think you want to use natural division
